name: A Social Life
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 40. The Theme: "The more you have, the worse it gets".

This was vague to me so my game is designed to annoy you and maybe infuriate you at the lack of anything.

Enjoy!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Exit Full screen GUIs

Don't forget to come on and vote for my game at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/a-social-life
